basics.name: Rossella Gamba
basics.label: N3AS Fellow
basics.summary: Postdoc at PSU and UC Berkeley.

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

education.institution: Friedrich Schiller University Jena, Jena, Germany

awards.summary: Prize for the best PhD thesis in Theoretical Physics 2023, Friedrich Schiller University Jena

open source projects.name: teobresums
open source projects.summary: Effective-One-Body waveform model for gravitational waves from generic compact binaries.

open source projects.name: PyART
open source projects.summary: Python package for analytical and numerical relativity.
